ud5.8:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
ud5.8:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando tadahuposathe pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
ud5.8:4.1: Addasā kho devadatto āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ.
ud5.8:4.4: “ajjatagge dānāhaṃ, āvuso ānanda, aññatreva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cā”ti.
ud5.8:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando rājagahe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud5.8:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud5.8:6.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisiṃ.
ud5.8:6.2: Addasā kho maṃ, bhante, devadatto rājagahe piṇḍāya carantaṃ.
ud5.8:6.5: ‘ajjatagge dānāhaṃ, āvuso ānanda, aññatreva bhagavatā aññatra bhikkhusaṅghā uposathaṃ karissāmi saṅghakammāni cā’ti.
ud5.8:6.6: Ajja, bhante, devadatto saṅghaṃ bhindissati, uposathañca karissati saṅghakammāni cā”ti.
ud5.8:7.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
